participant_1.background:
My wedding planning business took off after I had my home featured in a magazine for being the cleanest in the city.
i am a member of the ymca.
my nickname is bubblegum.
i like to swim.
my favorite subject in school is math.

participant_2.background:
I love to listen to rap music on YouTube and read about my favorite charities on their websites.
My family and friends are my favorite people.
I live in a large house with a lot of land to keep me busy on the weekends.
My beard is a part of my personality, and I love antiques.
I went to the Amazon rainforest with my older brother and saw monkeys in the wild.

content.text: What's up?
Not much, just listening to some rap music. What are you doing?
I'm working on my business. I'm a wedding planner.
Oh, that sounds cool! What's your favorite part about it?
I love helping people plan their special day. It's so rewarding.
That's awesome! I'm sure you're really good at it.
I try my best. I'm glad you think so.
What's the most interesting wedding you've ever planned?
That's a tough one. I've planned a lot of great weddings.
I can imagine. It's such a special event for people.
Yeah, it really is. I think my favorite wedding was one I planned for a couple who met in the Amazon rainforest.
That sounds amazing! I've always wanted to go to the Amazon rainforest.
It's an amazing place. I'm glad they were able to have their wedding there.
Me too. It must have been a beautiful wedding.
It was. It was the perfect place for them.
I'm sure it was. You're so lucky to have been able to plan that wedding.
I know. It was a great experience.
I bet it was. Well, I'm glad you're doing well with your business.
Thanks. I appreciate it.
No problem. Have a good day.
You too.
